body:
Comment 1: 
We should probably just delete -path.
-path is a hack for a use case that only exists inside
Google, and it causes confusion when people try to
use it in other contexts.

In this case you can say
    godoc .

Godoc should respect $GOPATH (which has different
rules from -path), and that's what people should be using.
I think it might do this already.
